snippet: Being a reporter was found to be one of the worst jobs in the land, and Malcolm Gladwell described newspapers as "dreary, depressed places." Is being a reporter still a caper or has it become a hopeless grind? Please visit and comment.
abstract: Being a reporter was found to be one of the worst jobs in the land, and Malcolm Gladwell described newspapers as "dreary, depressed places." Is being a reporter still a caper or has it become a hopeless grind? Please visit and comment.

headline.main: Fill in the Blank: Being a Reporter Is the ______ Job in the World
